00043 /* Additional commands */
00044 
00045 inline CI_RESULT CI_Simple_SaveString(CI_VOID *pHandle, TCHAR *szSession, TCHAR *szProp, TCHAR *szString)
00046 {
00047         CI_StringAlloc szCommand(szProp,szString,16);
00048 
00049         if(szCommand==NULL)
00050                 return E_OUTOFMEMORY;
00051         _stprintf_s(szCommand,szCommand.size(),_T("setenv ") _T("\"") __TS _T("\"") _T(" \"") __TS _T("\"") ,szProp, szString);
00052         return reinterpret_cast<ICiplCtlMgr *>(pHandle)->ExecuteImmediateCmdString(szSession, szCommand);
00053 }
00054 
00055 inline CI_RESULT CI_Simple_LoadString(CI_VOID *pHandle, TCHAR *szSession, TCHAR *szProp, CI_TCHAR *szString, CI_U32 u32String, CI_S32 *pu32Returned = NULL)
00056 {
00057         CI_StringAlloc szCommand(szProp,13);
00058 
00059         if(szCommand==NULL)
00060                 return E_OUTOFMEMORY;
00061         _stprintf_s(szCommand,szCommand.size(),_T("getenv ") _T("\"") __TS _T("\""),szProp);
00062         return reinterpret_cast<ICiplCtlMgr *>(pHandle)->ExecuteImmediateCmdString(szSession, szCommand, szString, u32String, (DWORD *)pu32Returned);
00063 }
00064 
00076 inline CI_RESULT CI_Simple_StoreLocal(CI_VOID *pHandle, TCHAR *szSession, TCHAR *szFilePath)
00077 {
00078         CI_S32 s32Position = 0;
00079         CI_Simple_Get(pHandle, szSession, _T("position"), s32Position);
00080 
00081         CI_Simple_SaveString(pHandle, szSession, _T("file name"), szFilePath);
00082 
00083         TCHAR szPosition[32] = {0};
00084         CI_Simple_SaveString(pHandle, szSession, _T("position"), _itot(s32Position, szPosition, 10));
00085 
00086         return CI_Simple_CloseSource(pHandle, szSession);
00087 }
00088 
00099 inline CI_RESULT CI_Simple_RestoreLocal(CI_VOID *pHandle, TCHAR *szSession)
00100 {
00101         TCHAR szFilePath[MAX_PATH] = {0};
00102         CI_Simple_LoadString(pHandle, szSession, _T("file name"), szFilePath, MAX_PATH);
00103 
00104         TCHAR szPosition[32] = {0};
00105         CI_Simple_LoadString(pHandle, szSession, _T("position"), szPosition, 32);
00106 
00107         CI_StringAlloc szCommand(szFilePath,MAX_PATH);
00108         if(szCommand==NULL)
00109                 return E_OUTOFMEMORY;
00110         _stprintf_s(szCommand,szCommand.size(),_T("open file \"") __TS _T("\"; wait device; pause; set position %d; resume"),szFilePath,_ttol(szPosition));
00111         return reinterpret_cast<ICiplCtlMgr *>(pHandle)->ExecuteImmediateCmdString(szSession, szCommand);
00112 }
